name: MetatoyDragonz Adventure
description:
This game is an entry for 2022 metatoydragonz contest held by Sandbox & Klaytn.

Roguelike style game with Metatoydragonz. you can play basic Metatoydragonz who have their own characteristic and skills and also if you have your own MTDZ then, your chracter can be a next "real player" in this game.

Get the pieces of the crown and get a ticket for a chance to be an owner the next new NFT Metatoydragonz.

if you are interested in this project. check this notion link to get more description about the project. https://yoyosproject.notion.site/MetatoyDragons-Adventure-566871c4684e4fe1903c82ad05ed77cc
